title: "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline"
body:
I could not log in into my account and I was already in a game. This message, "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline," popped up, and now I have leaverbuster. I've already fixed the problem by following the steps in this site: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline . My question is, "is there anyway you can remove the leaverbuster because of this bug?" 

Thank you! @Canadian Pizza

replies.body:
We're currently investigating this offline error in our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, but this workaround should help in the meantime:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

We can look into your Leaverbuster, but no guarantees!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OF00y8hA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-14T18:31:08.352+0000)
>
> We're currently investigating this offline error in our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, but this workaround should help in the meantime:
> 
> Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
> Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
> Find the line:
> 
> gameflow-patcher-lock:
> 
> Delete this whole line
> Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.
> 
> We can look into your Leaverbuster, but no guarantees!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do.

Hello,

I also have the same problem! I was mid game, disconnected, and was not able to sign in back to my account. 
It says "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline." for me too.

My other friend has the same problem as well. Hasn't happened to us yet until today's update!

If you haven't fixed your problem yet, you can follow these steps from Riot. 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline 

Riot is currently working on this bug, hopefully they can fix it soon! 

Cheers!
Try to opem CMD and write "ipconfig/flushdns" ...it worked for me :)
